title: Tammy Hembrow and Jahkoy Palmer hint they are ENGAGED
text:
Instagram sensation Tammy Hembrow has sparked engagement rumours with her boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer.

The Gold Coast influencer shared two rare fully clothed mirror selfies on Monday, while noticeably hiding her ring finger in both.

'Make you nervous,' Tammy cryptically captioned the post, which prompted Jahkoy to comment with an engagement ring emoji.

Something to tell us? Instagram star Tammy Hembrow (pictured) has sparked engagement rumours with boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer as she celebrates reaching 10 million followers

In the pictures, Tammy is seen wearing a black PVC trench coat and matching pants.

While posing in front of a bathroom mirror, the busty blonde kept her left hand firmly in her pocket, and then hid it behind her back.

Jahkoy's comment with the ring emoji sent fans into a frenzy, with some responding, 'Oh my god!' and 'You're perfect together'.

Hidden! The Gold Coast influencer shared two rare fully clothed mirror pictures on Monday, while noticeably hiding her ring finger in both

Hmm! 'Make you nervous,' Tammy cryptically captioned the post, which prompted Jahkoy to comment with an engagement ring emoji (above)

On Tuesday afternoon, Tammy shared another mirror selfie, in which her left hand was once again concealed, possibly hiding an engagement ring.

'Thank you guys for 10 mill. Sooo crazy. Grateful [as f**k] for every one of you,' she wrote, as she celebrated reaching 10 million followers on Instagram.

Tammy is believed to be in Toronto, after flying to Canada last week to support Jahkoy at an Adidas showcase held at the exclusive Soho House.

Happy couple: Jahkoy's comment with the ring emoji sent fans into a frenzy, with some responding, 'Oh my god!' and 'You're perfect together'

Loved up! On Tuesday afternoon, Tammy shared another mirror selfie (above), in which her left hand was once again concealed, possibly hiding an engagement ring

Tammy and Jahkoy went public with their romance in late June, when the Canadian rapper uploaded several photos of the couple to Instagram.

They have since been very on and off, regularly unfollowing and re-following each other on Instagram while traveling across Australia, the U.S. and Canada.

In September, Jahkoy appeared to beg for forgiveness in his song Granted, with the lyrics suggesting that Tammy's popularity on social media may have caused them to split.

Going public: Tammy and Jahkoy went public with their romance in late June, when the Canadian rapper uploaded several photos of the couple to Instagram

'I'm remembering the times when you were only mine, baby. Yeah, wow you flexing on [Instagram] with a hundred thousand likes,' he rapped.

'Can't believe I took you for granted, now I gotta fix all the damage. You got me out here stranded, it's getting hard to manage.'

Jahkoy is Tammy's first confirmed boyfriend since her split from ex-fiancé Reece Hawkins in June 2018.
description: Instagram sensation Tammy Hembrow has sparked engagement rumours with her boyfriend Jahkoy Palmer.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
